channel.title: 525 Client wont Connect to Server
channel.description:
When ever I start the client i keep getting this error The server is running and it works cause my friends are connecting to it and I got on it a couple of times.
When i Start the server it loads up lets me connect when i Exit out the CLIENT and turn it back on i get this error.
[IMG]http://i103.photobucket.com/albums/m143/Aces14/error.jpg[/img]
When i Switch the servers it SOMETIMES connect to the other server and then i switch back to my original to connect on it.
But now it dosent even do that anymore it wont even connect can someone help me so i can play 525 servers? thanks.

item.title: 525 Client wont Connect to Server
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

Iam, where does the cache go?

Read full topic

item.title: 525 Client wont Connect to Server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Make sure your cache is in the incorrect directory, and you’re connecting to the correct port.

Read full topic

item.title: 525 Client wont Connect to Server
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

umm please get back to topic.

Iam having same problem its like it works when it WANTS to work and when it Don’t it dosen’t.

Any1 no how to fix it?

item.title: 525 Client wont Connect to Server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Basically. I coded ZymusScape, Which is what dragonking(My irl cousin) based his server off. He also doesn’t know as much about java as i do, so when he needs a GUI, or a server fix her comes to me.

Read full topic

item.title: 525 Client wont Connect to Server
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:3, topic:291754”]What do you mean their difficult??? I made that client.

You have to make sure your cache is in the correct location, and that your connecting to the right server IP and port.[/quote]
so you made dragonscape??? well it usually decides whether or not to work for me. i usually get the error_game.js5crc …plus im not experienced enough in coding to try and code 525 servers so i reverted back to allstarscape.

Read full topic

item.title: 525 Client wont Connect to Server
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

ya… i know 525 clients like dragon scape are kinda weird and like to be difficult. When i used dragonscape client, it wouldn’t work unless you let the server fully boot up, then it was able to connect to the server. but sometimes i’d get stupid errors like “error_game.js5crc” or something like that. Honastly i think it might be the client cuz i’ve had nothing but problems with it.

Read full topic
